6. **Adjust IP ADDRESS SETTING.**
   - Select **AUTO** to use an IP address assigned by the network.
   - Select **MANUAL** to choose the IP address manually as described in ‚ÄúConnecting Using an IP Address‚Äù (üìñ 265).

   !IP Address Setting

7. **Select NEXT** to proceed after adjusting IP address settings.

   !Next Option

8. **Name the communication setting profile.**

   !Communication Setting Name

9. **Create a user name and password** for use when connecting to the camera from a computer or tablet. Press **MENU/OK**.

   !Username & Password Setting

10. **Enter a user name.**

    !User Name Entry
